Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students trying to communicate over a distance.
The student can include a design of a string telephone, showing how it is built with cups and strings.
The student can illustrate how sound travels along the string to communicate information.
The student can label parts of the device, indicating how sound is used to send messages.
The student can draw a scenario showing the students successfully communicating using the string telephone.
The student can illustrate how the device uses sound waves (shown as lines or waves) traveling from one student to the other.
The student can represent why communicating over long distances is useful for people.
